book.title: Guards! Guards! (Discworld #8)
book.description: Storyline: Guards! Guards! (Discworld #8) Here there be dragons . . . and the denizens of Ankh-Morpork wish one huge firebreather would return from whence it came. Long believed extinct, a superb specimen of draco nobilis ("noble dragon" for those who don't understand italics) has appeared in Discworld's greatest city. Not only does this unwelcome visitor have a nasty habit of charbroiling everything in its path, in rather short order it is crowned King (it is a noble dragon, after all . . .).
book.author: Terry Pratchett

book.title: Guards! Guards! (Discworld #8)
